description.value:
Master Crafted Relic Astartes Narthecium of the Red Scorpions Chapter. Grants +30 to Medicae Tests to treat Space Marines and Humans. User can re-roll failed Medicae Tests and heal one additional wound with each use of First Aid. Also grants regular Astartes Narthecium benefits.

Effect: Famed

Notes: 35 R
